summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1603, for the improvement of 19th Avenue Northwest, in the City of Seattle, from West 65th Street to West 75th Street, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 17165 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
